ingredients: 3 jalapeno peppers, minced, or to taste
2 serrano peppers, minced, or to taste (optional)
1 habanero pepper, minced, or to taste (optional)
3 cloves garlic, minced, or to taste
1 tablespoon olive oil, or to taste
recipe: Combine the jalapeno peppers, serrano peppers, habanero pepper, onion, garlic, avocados, Roma tomatoes, diced tomatoes, and lemon juice into a food processor. Drizzle in the olive oil; season to taste with salt and pepper. Pulse until the salsamole has reached your desired consistency.
